question: Which construction major has bagged the contract for construction of steel bridges for Mumbai and Ahmedabad bullet train project?
explanation:
The Indian construction major L&T Construction, has bagged the contract for building 28 steel bridges for Mumbai and Ahmedabad bullet train project.
The order costs about Rs.1000 crore to Rs.2500 crore. It involves procurement, fabrication, assembly and erection of bridges at various sites in the line. This project has been bagged as a consortium of L&T and Japanâ€™s IHI Infrastructure Systems.
